product_name: Terry Breakaway Mesh Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Sure to be your summer favorite, the women's Terry Breakaway Mesh Bike Jersey features a relaxed fit, elastic-free hem and a longer length than previous versions for great performance. Polyester top features mesh side panels for enhanced ventilation. Provides anti-odor properties and UPF 50+ sun protection. Deep 10 in. zipper lets you customize your airflow. Terry Breakaway Mesh Bike Jersey offers 2 rear open pockets to stash snacks and more.
short_description: Sure to be your summer favorite, the women's Terry Breakaway Mesh Bike Jersey features a relaxed fit, elastic-free hem and a longer length than previous versions for great performance.
